EmailTemplate.name: Version5 Training.Reminder - More dates (CA)
EmailTemplate.subject: Revised Date and Time: VisiCAD Regional Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> Complimentary Training: Everything You Need to Know About VisiCAD 5.2
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Did you miss TriCON last year? Or maybe you came, but upgrading to VisiCAD 5.2 seemed too far away. Well, in mid-June VisiCAD 5.2 will be available and we want to get you ready to move forward. VisiCAD 5.2 is filled with significant enhancements to enable an agency’s personnel to be more efficient and productive such as Advisor, Internet Integration, VisiNet Configuration, System Health Monitor, and much more. <http://offers.tritech.com/rs/ortivusna/images/VisiCAD Regional Training 5 2 PDF.pdf>
We hope that you will join us and fellow VisiCAD users in this intimate environment for an in-depth training session discussing the functionality, set up and system planning for VisiCAD 5.2. We're coming to you, so come ready - ready to learn, ready to ask questions and ready to move to VisiCAD 5.2!
Agenda:
9:00 AM - 12:00 NOON VisiCAD 5.2 Functionality and Demonstration
12:00 NOON - 1:30 PM Complimentary Lunch will be provided
1:30 PM - 4:00 PM System Planning and Question and Answer Session with Technical Services
Register here: http://offers.tritech.com/Version5Training_Registration.html <http://offers.tritech.com/Version5Training_Registration.html>
**Note: Training will focus solely on VisiCAD. VisiNet Mobile will NOT be covered.
Questions? Gladys Ferguson, Training Supervisor TriTech Software Systems (858) 799-7383
Dates and Locations Register to Save Your Seat Date and Location Tuesday, July 31 TriTech Corporate Headquarters 9477 Waples Street, Suite 100 San Diego, CA 92121 (new location)
Time: 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM
Bonus: Light continental breakfast and lunch will be provided.
Cost: Complimentary
<http://offers.tritech.com/Version5Training_Registration.html>
